ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if there are any other classes w/o training facilities in Kunark. Gordon has posted about this issue and his story is that the trainers and merchants
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if there are any other classes w/o training facilities in Kunark.
Gordon has posted about this issue and his story is that the trainers and
merchants who are there were only put there for the beta testers - who could
not leave the zone during the test. He says they merely forgot to take them
out but are gonna leave them there but not add any more of them. He says
they wanted Kunark to be a place that would require you to have needs to
return to the other continents - not be a fully populated place that you
would not ever have to leave. Anyways, that's his story.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

p.s. I have this stone bridge in North Karana - for sale really cheap! You
can charge ppl to cross it and make your money back in no time at all!

p.s.s. Jacana, and all others on Inny, feel free to /tell me if you need
some transport. If I am not too busy, I can usually have my wizard on the
2nd PC teleport. He's only 31 so it's one-way from FV to North K, Tox or
Ghetto Faydark.

p.s.s.s. He (my 31 wiz) was standing on the FV bridge one day - on the side
near the merchants and such. I hear this noise of a fight and glance at the
other screen and see the guards telling something that they dont tolerate
foul creatures, etc. etc. So, I wonder who trained a spider all the way to
the bridge and dont pay any attention. A moment later, I hear my wiz
getting attacked! So now I look and see the Ancient Jarsath hitting him for
110. Ouch! While he fumbles for yonder or gate, the AJ kills him and then
I realize that he was standing at his *bind point* !!!! So, I power off the
PC and hope for the best. When I got back on, he only took one death -
thankfully! But the AJ somehow chewed his way past all four bridge guards
and I guess one of the patrolling scouts finally took him out. There were
half a dozen or so pc corpses strewn along the bridge.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Cheryl Kiraly" <cheryl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 18, 2000 7:14 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark


> Just curious - are bards the only guild that do not have a trainer there?
I
> saw many other trainers along the way and even someone to sell songs....

>
> Jacana, Wood Elf Bard of the 17th song, Innoruuk
